titleStmt.title: Variants of IPFV inflection: 2sg.f in sound verbs
titleStmt.author: Veronika Engler

sourceDesc.p: This is the feature-file for IPFV inflection: 2sg.f in sound verbs.

revisionDesc.change: For EGY-___ there are no values found

wib:featureValueObservation.note: Observed only in some speakers from the elderly group (+70), and only in defective and concave verbs in pausal position.
Panetta says that this suffix exists alongside ī but no example is provided.
the prefix is d-, not t-, no GD (p.65)
